infobox.Japanese title:: ロシアンブルーの秘密  (Roshian Burū no Himitsu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Eri Kisaki  Sonoko Suzuki  Yoko Okino
infobox.Case solved by:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Goro  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Gara Takashima as Eri Kisaki  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Tetsuo Mizutori as Kirishita  Masayo Kurata as Colleague's daughter
infobox.Closing song:: Mō Kimi Dake o Hanashitari wa Shinai

sections.Situation: Kogoro is asked by a man to solve a coded text message from his daughter since she refused to tell him the meaning of the message. Meanwhile, Eri has left her Russian Blue kitten, Goro, in the care of Kogoro. While Kogoro attempts to decipher the message, Goro drops a dictionary to translate English in Japanese causing Kogoro to realize that the English letters of the code can be translated to Japanese. Goro sneaks into Kogoro's video tape collection and where he notices tape is missing and realizes the message contains Hiragana and Katakana with missing strokes.
sections.People:
- Kogoro's client
- Mr. Kirishita's daughter
- Ms. Kirishita's co-worker
sections.Trivia: - Although Eri Kisaki's cat, Goro, made an appearance in The Private Eyes' Requiem, this case is his first canon appearance.
